title: icryptofbi
author: icryptofbi
content: Network of mixer sites that are fraudulent:anonymixer[.]netbitcloak[.]orgbtc-laundry[.]orgmonero-mixer-xmr-mixer[.]comcoinpal[.]eumonero-mixer[.]onlinebitcoinmixer[.]ruanonymixer[.]netbitmix[.]ccThis scammer advertises his sites through reddit and youtubehttps://www.reddit.com/user/funguscutie/All the sites that he advertises are scam sites! Don't send him money!

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: icryptofbi on February 14, 2023, 09:43:38 PMNetwork of mixer sites that are fraudulent:<...>Hey OP, appreciate yer effort, but we already have an exaustive list of scam and dead mixer sites that u can check out: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5381839.0If u find any new suspicious site, I think it would be a good idea to report it there so that LeGaulois updates his list.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I have seen this kind of tactic for a while. Most commonly they use YouTube and blog reviews to make a list of top 5 or top 10 mixer sites but in actual sense, all the Bitcoin mixers listed are scamUnfortunately, some people fall for this kind of scam because they do not do proper research.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Most of the buttons and links on those websites don't even work. On the footer of the second website from the above list, they claim they have a bitcoin Ann and campaign threads, which is obviously not true. I wonder how would someone trust such fake websites and send them his money!Some of them are already on the list of known fake mixers created by LeGaulois, as decodx has mentioned. You can post on his thread so he can update to let him know about the other ones.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Fraudulent mixers are the worst type of fraud, since they are illegal in all countries so there is nothing you can do if you are scammed.The only guarantee is that the mixer is reliable, otherwise if they steal your money, you will lose it forever and you will never be able to get it back again. You will not be able to file a complaint against them to any government agency.So the only way is to warn users about these scam mixers before they fall into their trap.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: It is good you let us know by creating this topic for our view. Many must have likely be scammed of their hard earned resources unknown to them that those mixers listed are not what they thought they are but I had a second thought over it, OP have not yet presented any evidence to back the claim of scam accusations and I would also ask op if op have hadany experience with any of the mixers mentioned on this thread.  I think presenting an evidence too would help go along way to back ops claims.  There are still good mixers out there that you can give a try such as [banned mixer]. Proven to be reliable and trustworthy.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on February 15, 2023, 03:43:28 PMThere are still good mixers out there that you can give a try such as [banned mixer]. Proven to be reliable and trustworthy.Yes, there are a lot of good mixers as well, such as [banned mixer], which is in my signature, but it is the responsibility of any user to do his research and does not depend entirely on anyone’s recommendation because in the first and last, these are his assets and he is the first responsible for them. There have been many scam mixers that try to appear as legitimate and offer desirable features to anyone, and in addition to that, there are scammers who create sites similar to the official legal mixer, so we have to pay attention to the official mixer domain link that we will deal with, also what falls on us is to report their scam domains so that more customers and users do not incur Potential vast losses of their capital.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on February 15, 2023, 09:17:01 AMFraudulent mixers are the worst type of fraud, since they are illegal in all countries so there is nothing you can do if you are scammed.The only guarantee is that the mixer is reliable, otherwise if they steal your money, you will lose it forever and you will never be able to get it back again. You will not be able to file a complaint against them to any government agency.So the only way is to warn users about these scam mixers before they fall into their trap.There are other mixers who are dedicated to marketing their service and platform to the community and they promote in places where they can show their legitimacy one of these places is here in Bitcointalk and one of these is Yomix, in the past, there's only one mixer that actively promotes their service here, I'm glad we have two or three more, Mixer users will have a wide range of choice, use them and compare each service.

comments.author: Bitcoadvice
comments.created_time: February 17, 2023, 12:42:38 PMLast edit: February 17, 2023, 12:58:56 PM by Bitcoadvice
comments.body: Hi, i founded another scam sites here: anonymix[.]so - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]bestmixer[.mx] - Clone/Phishing site of Bestmixer.iobitmix[.bz] - Clone/Phishing site of Bitmix.bizbitmixr[.bz] - Clone/Phishing site of Bitmix.bizcriptomixer[.]io - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]coinmixer-es[.]net - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]ltc-qr-code[.]com - Custom made QR code phishing site which shows always the same page with fraudsters QR code - ltc-qr-code[.]com/qrm.php Beware of these fraudulent websites.

comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoadvice on February 17, 2023, 12:42:38 PMHi, i founded another scam sites here: anonymix[.]so - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]bestmixer[.mx] - Clone/Phishing site of Bestmixer.iobitmix[.bz] - Clone/Phishing site of Bitmix.bizbitmixr[.bz] - Clone/Phishing site of Bitmix.bizcriptomixer[.]io - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]coinmixer-es[.]net - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]ltc-qr-code[.]com - Custom made QR code phishing site which shows always the same page with fraudsters QR code - ltc-qr-code[.]com/qrm.php Beware of these fraudulent websites.andbitcoin-qrcodegenerator[.]com Another scam site for qr code generator

comments.author: Bitcoadvice
comments.body: Quote from: icryptofbi on February 17, 2023, 08:36:39 PMQuote from: Bitcoadvice on February 17, 2023, 12:42:38 PMHi, i founded another scam sites here: anonymix[.]so - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]bestmixer[.mx] - Clone/Phishing site of Bestmixer.iobitmix[.bz] - Clone/Phishing site of Bitmix.bizbitmixr[.bz] - Clone/Phishing site of Bitmix.bizcriptomixer[.]io - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]coinmixer-es[.]net - Clone/Phishing site of [banned mixer]ltc-qr-code[.]com - Custom made QR code phishing site which shows always the same page with fraudsters QR code - ltc-qr-code[.]com/qrm.php Beware of these fraudulent websites.andbitcoinqrcodegeneraor[.]com Another scam site for qr code generatorI found another FAKE QR Code Generator: Crypto-qr-code[.]comBeware of this SCAM.
